name: Graveland
description: '''Graveland''' are a Polish [[pagan black metal]] band which was formed in 1991 by [[Rob Darken]] (born Robert Fudali). They began as a [[black metal]] band before adopting a pagan and [[Viking metal]] style. The band's themes are frequently associated with the [[National Socialist black metal]] scene. The lyrics and imagery of Graveland are strongly inspired by European mythology, nature, winter and war. Their early work focused on [[Celtic mythology|Celtic]] and [[Slavic paganism|Slavic mythology]], while their later work focuses on [[Norse mythology]] and [[Heathenry (new religious movement)|Wotanism]].
